    Reference

    All functions

    LAB_DETAILS

    Available lab names

    hemoglobin_data creatinine_data

    Example values of Hemoglobin and Creatinine

    ln_convert_units()

    Convert values to the default units for the lab

    ln_download_data() ln_data_downloaded()

    Download high-resolution reference distributions

    ln_lab_units() ln_lab_default_units()

    Get available units for a lab

    ln_normalize() ln_normalize_multi() ln_normalize_ukbb() ln_normalize_multi_ukbb() ln_normalize_multi_clalit() ln_normalize_clalit()

    Normalize lab values to age and sex

    ln_plot_dist()

    Plot age-sex distribution of a lab

    ln_quantile_value() ln_patients_quantile_value()

    Compute the lab value for a given quantile

    ln_ukbb_labs()

    Get available UKBB labs
